whyMe.title: Why me

join.title: Join
join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

sharkie.title: Sharkie
sharkie.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.

polloLoco.title: El Pollo Loco
polloLoco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

references.title: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me

noah.name: Noah Mueller
noah.text: Jonas really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We finished the project in no time.

evelyn.name: Evelyn Marx
evelyn.text: Working with Jonas was a great experience. He is a talented developer who always finds creative solutions to problems.

james.name: James Rugman
james.text: Jonas is an exceptional developer with a keen eye for detail. His dedication to the project was outstanding.
